author: mcooper
msg: TRINIDAD-972 Fixed a case where nested iterators were not working because when their children are extracted via UIXComponent.processFlattenedChildren API, the underlying UIXCollection cache was not properly initialized or flushed since this route never invokes encodeBegin() from UIXCollection.

author: mcooper
msg: TRINIDAD-972 Fixed a case where nested iterators were not working because when their children are extracted via UIXComponent.processFlattenedChildren API, the underlying UIXCollection cache was not properly initialized or flushed since this route never invokes encodeBegin() from UIXCollection.

author: jeromy
msg: WW-2511 fixed OGNL expression in the I18n component to call TextProvider's getTexts(bundleName) method.  Added new unit test for this tag.

author: gnodet
msg: Fix possible NPE and fix classloader problems (default to self-first instead of parent-first)
